#include<stdio.h>
int main(){
char prod[2001]={0};
int a,b,count=2000,i;
scanf("%d%d",&a,&b);
i=a;
while(i!=0){
prod[count]=i%10;
i/=10;
count--;
}
count=2000;
b--;
int temp=0;
while(b--){
while(count>0){
int v=prod[count];
prod[count]=(temp+(v*a))%10;
temp=(temp+(v*a))/10;
count--;
}
prod[0]=temp+(prod[0]*a);
count=2000;
}
long unsigned sum=0;
for(i=0;prod[i]==0;i++);
for(;i<2001;i++){
//int t=prod[i];
printf("%d",prod[i]);
while(prod[i]!=0){
sum+=prod[i]%10;
prod[i]/=10;
}
}
printf("\n%lu\n",sum);
//getch();
return 0;
}
